Think it has been posted before but I post it again for those of you having issue with the install of it.

1. Install FSX (make sure you have atleast 15gb left)
2. download all 3 DVD
3. Copy DVD image from DVD 2 and 3 to DVD 1 forlder
4. Start install and when asked to change DVD just press "OK" and it will continue without you doing anything else.
